entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:48 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
